languages.text: "Дети Империума да убоятся греха, и да склонят колени пред троном Терры".
"The children of the Imperium shall fear unrighteousness and bend the knee before the throne of Terra."
languages.original_text: "Дети Империума да убоятся греха, и да склонят колени пред троном Терры".

traits.locale_text: "The children of the Imperium shall fear sin and bend the knee before the throne of Terra."
"The children of the Imperium shall fear sin and bend the knee before the throne of Terra."
"The children of the Imperium shall fear sin and bend the knee before the throne of Terra."
"The children of the Imperium shall fear unrighteousness and bend the knee before the throne of Terra."

languages.text: “帝国的子民应当畏惧罪恶，应当跪倒在泰拉的黄金王座前。”
languages.original_text: "The children of the Imperium shall fear unrighteousness and bend the knee before the throne of Terra."

traits.locale_text: “帝国的子民应当畏惧罪恶，应当跪倒在泰拉的黄金王座前。”

languages.text: «Los hijos del Imperium temen la falta de rectitud y se arrodillan ante el trono de Terra».
languages.original_text: "The children of the Imperium shall fear unrighteousness and bend the knee before the throne of Terra."

traits.locale_text: «Los hijos del Imperium temen el pecado y se arrodillan ante el trono de Terra».

languages.text: 「帝国の子は不正をおそれ、地球の玉座の前にひざまずく」
languages.original_text: "The children of the Imperium shall fear unrighteousness and bend the knee before the throne of Terra."

traits.locale_text: 「帝国の子は不正をおそれ、地球の玉座の前にひざまずく」

languages.text: "Die Kinder des Imperiums werden die Unrechtschaffenheit fürchten und vor dem Thron von Terra auf die Knie gehen."
languages.original_text: "The children of the Imperium shall fear unrighteousness and bend the knee before the throne of Terra."

traits.locale_text: "Die Kinder des Imperiums werden die Sünde fürchten und vor dem Thron von Terra auf die Knie gehen."

languages.text: « Les enfants de l'Imperium se garderont des errements et se prosterneront devant le trône de Terra. »
languages.original_text: "The children of the Imperium shall fear unrighteousness and bend the knee before the throne of Terra."

traits.locale_text: « Les enfants de l'Imperium se garderont du péché et se prosterneront devant le trône de Terra. »

languages.text: "İmparatorluk evlatları günahkârlıktan korkacak, Terra'nın Tahtı önünde diz çökecekler."
languages.original_text: "The children of the Imperium shall fear unrighteousness and bend the knee before the throne of Terra."

traits.locale_text: "İmparatorluk evlatları günahkârlıktan korkacak, Terra'nın Tahtı önünde diz çökecekler."
